Automated Focus and Exposure: An advanced camera that can automatically adjust focus and exposure settings for optimal image quality.
Advanced Image Stabilization: A camera with built-in image stabilization technology to reduce camera shake and motion blur.
Enhanced Connectivity: A camera with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities for easy sharing and transfer of images to smartphones and other devices.
3D Image Capture: A camera that can capture 3D images by using multiple lenses and sensors to create a more immersive viewing experience.
Facial Recognition and Tracking: A camera with facial recognition and tracking capabilities to automatically adjust settings and features based on the subject's face.
